text: “Samarian arazir kuraba avɨrasemezir puvatɨzɨ, dar dɨbobonim mong nɨn arazir kurabar dɨbobonimɨn apengan iti. Nɨn arazir kuraba an arazir kurabagh afiragha bar mɨze. Ia 3plan amiziba, kɨ ian arazir kurabar gari, nɨn arazir kurabara bar ikufi. Ezɨ amizir igharazimningɨn arazir kuraba, kɨ dar gari, da mati pura biziba.
